paper_abstract: This paper investigates the H-infinity control problem for a class of uncertain nonlinear sampled-data systems which are a. ne in the inputs. A nonlinear bounded real lemma for sampled-data systems with nonlinear time-varying parameter uncertainty is provided. Based on this nonlinear bounded real lemma, the robust H-infinity control problem is solved in terms of both continuous and discrete Hamilton-Jacobi equations.
paper_title: Robust nonlinear H-infinity control of sampled-data systems
